sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Discrimination in Sale of Real Estate Act.

sections.heading: Inducements to sell or purchase by reason of race,
sections.text:
color, religion, national origin, ancestry, creed, physical or mental disability,
or sex - Prohibition of Solicitation.
It shall be unlawful for any person or corporation knowingly:

sections.heading: Whenever a person is convicted of any violation of this Act, the
sections.text:
clerk of the court shall report such conviction to the Department of
Professional Regulation, which shall thereupon revoke any certificate of
registration as a real estate broker or real estate salesman held by such
person.
